LanguageData.RT_M1070_HET.label: M1070 HET
LanguageData.RT_M1070_HET.description:
A large 8x8 tractor unit designed for transport, deploy, and evacuate other vehicles.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
